name: Glib
tagline: A simple general purpose C# library covering windows forms, XNA, extension methods, and more.
body:
### Welcome to Glib
This library simplifies usage of various APIs available in C#, such as XNA, Windows Forms, and conversions to common types, such as integer. For example, to parse a string as an integer, you can just run: `"Your string".ToInt()`.

### Users of our library
This library is currently being used by:
* [PGCGame](https://github.com/GreatMindsRobotics/PGCGame)

If you are using this library and want to be on this page, please contact @glen3b.

### Documentation
Docs are available as XML documentation when you build the project, or are in development on the [wiki](https://github.com/glen3b/Glib/wiki).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
